description: A warm, privacy-first relationship and memory management web app that lets users create rich profiles for important people, attach stories, photos, chat logs, and timelines, and revisit key moments—fully bilingual (Chinese/English) and stored locally in the browser via IndexedDB.
reflections: I independently designed and developed Lumina from end to end—including user pain-point analysis, information architecture, visual and interaction design, and an IndexedDB-based storage/backup system—and also mapped out future AI features (emotion analysis, relationship summaries, intelligent reminders) to demonstrate full-stack product thinking for AI-powered personal relationship tools.
